history.proof: intros P_or_not n. specialize (P_or_not n) as [Pn | not_Pn]. - left. exists n. shelve. - right. intros k lt_k_n Pk. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: nat -> Prop

Goal:
(forall x : nat, P x \/ ~ P x) -> forall n : nat, (exists k : nat, k < n /\ P k /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> ~ P i)) \/ (forall k : nat, k < n -> ~ P k)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
between_ind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> Prop), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
between_not_exists : forall (P Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), between P k l -> (forall n : nat, in_int k l n -> P n -> ~ Q n) -> ~ exists_between Q k l
dec_inh_nat_subset_has_unique_least_element : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> (exists n : nat, P n) -> has_unique_least_element le P
Inductive between (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := bet_emp : between P k k | bet_S : forall l : nat, between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l) Arguments between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bet_emp _%function_scope _%nat_scope Arguments bet_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive exists_between (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := exists_S : forall l : nat, exists_between Q k l -> exists_between Q k (S l) | exists_le : forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> exists_between Q k (S l) Arguments exists_between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments exists_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments exists_le _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
exists_in_int : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), exists_between Q k l -> exists2 m : nat, in_int k l m & Q m
le_lt_or_eq : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> n < m \/ n = m
Nat.le_neq : forall n m : nat, n < m < -> n <= m /\ n <> m
lt_n_Sm_le : forall n m : nat, n < S m -> n <= m
Nat.lt_irrefl : forall x : nat, ~ x < x
exists_S_le : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), exists_between Q k (S l) -> k <= l
exists_le_S : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), exists_between Q k l -> S k <= l
in_int_exists : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k l r : nat), in_int k l r -> Q r -> exists_between Q k l
Exists_Forall_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, P x \/ ~ P x) -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ Forall P l
list_choose_dec : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall ll : list X, {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ P x /\ (forall y : X, In y l -> ~ P y)}}} + {forall x : X, In x ll -> ~ P x}
list_first_dec : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall (a : X) (ll : list X), P a -> In a ll -> {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ P x /\ (forall y : X, In y l -> ~ P y)}}}
in_int_intro : forall p q r : nat, p <= r -> r < q -> in_int p q r
Exists_exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Exists P l < -> (exists x : A, In x l /\ P x)
Nat.le_antisymm : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m <= n -> n = m
reflect_sind : forall (P : Prop) (P0 : forall b : bool, reflect P b -> SProp), (forall p : P, P0 true (ReflectT P p)) -> (forall n : ~ P, P0 false (ReflectF P n)) -> forall (b : bool) (r : reflect P b), P0 b r
reflect_rect : forall (P : Prop) (P0 : forall b : bool, reflect P b -> Type), (forall p : P, P0 true (ReflectT P p)) -> (forall n : ~ P, P0 false (ReflectF P n)) -> forall (b : bool) (r : reflect P b), P0 b r
reflect_ind : forall (P : Prop) (P0 : forall b : bool, reflect P b -> Prop), (forall p : P, P0 true (ReflectT P p)) -> (forall n : ~ P, P0 false (ReflectF P n)) -> forall (b : bool) (r : reflect P b), P0 b r
neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ Forall P l -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
Forall_Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l}
OrderedRing.mk_SOR_theory : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rtimes x1 y1) (rtimes x2 y2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> req (ropp x1) (ropp x2)) ->...-> OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> P x)
Nat.le_0_l : forall n : nat, 0 <= n
BinNums.positive_ind : forall P : BinNums.positive -> Prop, (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xI p)) -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xO p)) -> P BinNums.xH -> forall p : BinNums.positive, P p
Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {~ Forall P l}
Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {Exists P l} + {~ Exists P l}
ssrbool.impliesPn : forall P Q : Prop, ssrbool.implies P Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
ssreflect.iffLRn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ P -> ~ Q
ssreflect.iffRLn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
OrderedRing.Rtimes_neq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ req n rO /\ ~ req m rO -> ~ req (rtimes n m) rO
OrderedRing.Rlt_trichotomy : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m \/ req n m \/ rlt m n
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
Record SOR (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_SOR_theory { SORsetoid : Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req; SORplus_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 ->...-> rlt rO (rtimes n m); SORneq_0_1 : ~ req rO rI } Arguments OrderedRing.SOR [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments OrderedRing.mk_SOR_theory [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [rplus rtimes rminus ropp req]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
ReflectF : forall P : Prop, ~ P -> reflect P false
ssrbool.introTn : forall (P : Prop) (b' : bool), reflect P (negb b') -> ~ P -> is_true b'
ssrbool.introN : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), reflect P b -> ~ P -> is_true (negb b)

```  
intros P_or_not n.
specialize (P_or_not n) as [Pn | not_Pn].
- left. exists n. auto.
- right. intros k lt_k_n Pk. intros i lt_i_k. specialize (not_Pn i). contradiction.
```

original: intros P_or_not n. specialize (P_or_not n) as [Pn | not_Pn]. - left. exists n. auto. - right. intros k lt_k_n Pk. intros i lt_i_k. specialize (not_Pn i). contradiction.
